TopicTitle: Mods for Kerbals needing room for long missions?

Articles.Content: Are there any mods that make kerbals need a habitat, or more modules/spave for longer missions?
USI-LS includes this.  And UKS/MKS-Lite have the corresponding parts
I think the Kerbalism mod includes something like this. I haven't used it before, so not sure how it works.
The only rub at the moment tho is that Kerbalism has some compatibility issues.

I'll probably give USI LS a try. I'd love to use Kerbalism, but the incompatibility with Remote Tech is a deal breaker for me 

 

Does USI LS have an option for more severe consequences for running out of Supplies? That's the reason I prefer TACLS

Edited May 3, 2016 by dlrk

Don't know if this fits here. My Deepfreeze mod allows you to freeze kerbals for long journeys. Supports USI LS and Kerbalism and used to support TAC LS, but waiting for someone to take that on from TaranisElsu.

2 hours ago, dlrk said:

I'll probably give USI LS a try. I'd love to use Kerbalism, but the incompatibility with Remote Tech is a deal breaker for me 

 

Does USI LS have an option for more severe consequences for running out of Supplies? That's the reason I prefer TACLS

You can edit the config to make running out of supplies fatal.

Snacks! Is a super light weight life support mod that adds no new parts and uses the crew cabins as it's bulk life support storage. There fore in order to fly deeper you need to build in more habitable space proportional to the length of your voyage.
